dialogOption.texten: 911, what's your emergency?
My leg hurts so much! Can you send help?
{ADRESS} Can you tell me where you currently are?
Yes, I'm at [[ADDRESS]], lying in the grass.
What happend?

I can't really remember, the last thing I know is that I was playing football with my friends. . . . . . . . . . Wait a moment. . . . . My friends just told me I was unconscious for around 1 or 2 minutes.
When did that all happend?
Seems to be 4-5 minutes ago. My friends thought that I was just fooling them.
{MORE DETAILS} Can you tell me more details.
I will try. What do you need to know?
Is your leg fractured? Or can you even see the bone?
. . . . . . . . I can't tell. I would say it looks normal, no blood or anything, but hurts like hell.
{OTHER INJURIES} Do you have any other injuries?
. . . Well I was unconscious if that counts, other than that. . . . . . Wait my friends just told me I was moving weird while being unconscious. No idea what that was.
{FIRST AID} Can your friends administer first aid to you?
Sure, what should they do?
{IMMOBILIZE} They should look around and see if they can find something like a splint.
. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . One of them found a branch, that should work, or?
Yeah, your friends should try to immobilize your leg.
{ICE} Do you have access to ice?
{SEND AMBULANCE} Just wait and don't move. I send the ambulance.
{NO EMERGENCY} That's not an emergency, please go to the next hospital or take a taxi.
Alright. Thank you!
You are joking? I should go to the next hospital? But my leg is really badly hurting.
{HANG UP} Sorry, can't help you.
{SEND AMBULANCE} Well, I can send an ambulance.
{SEND AMBULANCE} Alright, help will be with you shortly.
. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . They found nothing that would work as a splint.

reportElement.texten: You sent the ambulace too early, you didn't even ask where the patient is.
